mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_BOARD) AS "totalNum" , y.RNUM AS "rnum" , y.BSEQ AS "bseq" , y.TITLE AS "title" , y.CONTENT AS "content" , y.DISP_YN AS "disp_yn" , y.REG_ID AS "reg_id" , y.REG_DATE AS "reg_date" , y.MOD_ID AS "mod_id" , y.MOD_DATE AS "mod_date" FROM ( SELECT z.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT BSEQ , TITLE , CONTENT , DISP_YN , DEL_YN , (SELECT t2.LOGIN_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER t2 WHERE t2.CUST_ID = t1.REG_ID) AS REG_ID , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') AS REG_DATE , MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(MOD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') AS MOD_DATE FROM TBL_BOARD t1 ORDER BY BSEQ DESC ) z WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) y WHERE y.RNUM >= #{start_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD( BSEQ , TITLE , CONTENT , DISP_YN , DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( TBL_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'Y' , 'N' , #{cust_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{cust_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT BSEQ AS "bseq" , TITLE AS "title" , CONTENT AS "content" , DISP_YN AS "disp_yn" , DEL_YN AS "del_yn" , REG_ID AS "reg_id" , REG_DATE AS "reg_date" , MOD_ID AS "mod_id" , MOD_DATE AS "mod_date" FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BSEQ = #{bseq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT cseq , bseq , cgrp , cdepth , content , writer , reg_date , mod_date FROM bbs_comment WHERE bseq = #{bseq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} START WITH cdepth = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR cseq = cgrp ORDER SIBLINGS BY reg_date
